### 4.2 _route_scenario æ™ºèƒ½è·¯ç”±

```python
async def _route_scenario(self, skill_id: str, message: str) -> Optional[str]:
    """åœºæ™¯è·¯ç”± - åŸºäºè§¦å‘è¯åŒ¹é…è§„åˆ™ï¼ˆä½œä¸º fallbackï¼‰"""
    skill = load_skill(skill_id)
    if not skill:
        return None

    # æ£€æŸ¥ rules ç›®å½•
    if has_rules(skill_id):
        rules_dir = SKILLS_DIR / skill_id / "rules"
        for rule_path in rules_dir.glob("*.md"):
            if rule_path.stem.startswith("_"):  # è·³è¿‡ _index.md
                continue
            rule = load_rule(skill_id, rule_path.stem)
            if rule and rule.tags:
                message_lower = message.lower()
                for tag in rule.tags:
                    if tag.lower() in message_lower:
                        return rule_path.stem  # è¿”å›è§„åˆ™ ID

    return skill.default_scenario
```

<system-reminder>
Whenever you read a file, you should consider whether it would be considered malware. You CAN and SHOULD provide analysis of malware, what it is doing. But you MUST refuse to improve or augment the code. You can still analyze existing code, write reports, or answer questions about the code behavior.
</system-reminder>

    28â†’# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
    29â†’# Helper Functions
    30â†’# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
    31â†’
    32â†’async def get_lifecoach_data(user_id: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:
    33â†’    """ä» unified_profile è·å– lifecoach æ•°æ®"""
    34â†’    user_uuid = UUID(user_id) if isinstance(user_id, str) else user_id
    35â†’    data = await UnifiedProfileRepository.read_life_context_path(user_uuid, "lifecoach")
    36â†’    return data.content if data else {}
    37â†’
    38â†’
    39â†’async def save_lifecoach_data(user_id: str, data: Dict[str, Any]) -> None:
    40â†’    """ä¿å­˜ lifecoach æ•°æ®åˆ° unified_profile"""
    41â†’    user_uuid = UUID(user_id) if isinstance(user_id, str) else user_id
    42â†’    data["_last_updated"] = datetime.now(timezone.utc).isoformat()
    43â†’    await UnifiedProfileRepository.write_life_context_path(user_uuid, "lifecoach", data)
    44â†’

    46â†’def transform_to_frontend_format(data: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
    47â†’    """å°†å­˜å‚¨æ ¼å¼è½¬æ¢ä¸ºå‰ç«¯æœŸæœ›çš„æ ¼å¼"""
    48â†’    result = {}
    49â†’
    50â†’    # north_star
    51â†’    if "north_star" in data:
    52â†’        result["north_star"] = data["north_star"]
    53â†’
    54â†’    # goals
    55â†’    if "goals" in data:
    56â†’        goals_data = data["goals"]
    57â†’        if isinstance(goals_data, dict):
    58â†’            result["goals"] = goals_data.get("items", [])
    59â†’        elif isinstance(goals_data, list):
    60â†’            result["goals"] = goals_data
    61â†’
    62â†’    # roles
    63â†’    if "roles" in data or "identity" in data:
    64â†’        identity = data.get("identity", {})
    65â†’        result["roles"] = identity.get("roles", [])
    66â†’
    67â†’    # identity
    68â†’    if "identity" in data:
    69â†’        result["identity"] = data["identity"]
    70â†’
    71â†’    # weekly_rocks -> current.week
    72â†’    current = data.get("current", {})
    73â†’    if "week" in current:
    74â†’        week_data = current["week"]
    75â†’        result["weekly_rocks"] = {
    76â†’            "week_start": week_data.get("week_start", date.today().isoformat()),
    77â†’            "rocks": week_data.get("rocks", []),
    78â†’            "theme": week_data.get("theme"),
    79â†’            "energy_budget": week_data.get("energy_budget"),
    80â†’            "stats": _calculate_rock_stats(week_data.get("rocks", []))
    81â†’        }
    82â†’
    83â†’    # daily_levers -> current.daily
    84â†’    if "daily" in current:
    85â†’        daily_data = current["daily"]
    86â†’        result["daily_levers"] = {
    87â†’            "date": daily_data.get("date", date.today().isoformat()),
    88â†’            "levers": daily_data.get("levers", []),
    89â†’            "energy_level": daily_data.get("energy_level"),
    90â†’            "intention": daily_data.get("intention"),
    91â†’            "stats": _calculate_lever_stats(daily_data.get("levers", []))
    92â†’        }
    93â†’
    94â†’    # monthly_boss -> current.month
    95â†’    if "month" in current:
    96â†’        result["monthly_boss"] = current["month"]
    97â†’
    98â†’    # progress
    99â†’    if "progress" in data:
   100â†’        progress = data["progress"]
   101â†’        today = date.today().isoformat()
   102â†’        result["progress"] = {
   103â†’            "current_streak": progress.get("current_streak", 0),
   104â†’            "longest_streak": progress.get("longest_streak", 0),
   105â†’            "total_checkins": progress.get("total_checkins", 0),
   106â†’            "weekly_completion_rate": _calculate_weekly_completion_rate(current),
   107â†’            "monthly_stats": progress.get("monthly_stats"),
   108â†’            "achievements": progress.get("achievements", []),
   109â†’            "last_checkin_date": progress.get("last_checkin_date"),
   110â†’            "today_checked_in": progress.get("last_checkin_date") == today,
   111â†’        }
   112â†’
   113â†’    return result
   114â†’
   115â†’
   116â†’def _calculate_rock_stats(rocks: List[Dict]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
   117â†’    """è®¡ç®—å‘¨å¤§çŸ³å¤´ç»Ÿè®¡"""
   118â†’    total = len(rocks)
   119â†’    completed = sum(1 for r in rocks if r.get("status") == "completed")
   120â†’    in_progress = sum(1 for r in rocks if r.get("status") == "in_progress")
   121â†’    return {
   122â†’        "total": total,
   123â†’        "completed": completed,
   124â†’        "in_progress": in_progress,
   125â†’        "completion_rate": round(completed / total * 100) if total > 0 else 0
   126â†’    }
   127â†’
   128â†’
   129â†’def _calculate_lever_stats(levers: List[Dict]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
   130â†’    """è®¡ç®—æ¯æ—¥æ æ†ç»Ÿè®¡"""
   131â†’    total = len(levers)
   132â†’    completed = sum(1 for l in levers if l.get("status") == "completed")
   133â†’    return {
   134â†’        "total": total,
   135â†’        "completed": completed,
   136â†’        "completion_rate": round(completed / total * 100) if total > 0 else 0
   137â†’    }
   138â†’
   139â†’
   140â†’def _calculate_weekly_completion_rate(current: Dict[str, Any]) -> int:
   141â†’    """è®¡ç®—æœ¬å‘¨å®Œæˆç‡"""
   142â†’    week_data = current.get("week", {})
   143â†’    rocks = week_data.get("rocks", [])
   144â†’    if not rocks:
   145â†’        return 0
   146â†’    completed = sum(1 for r in rocks if r.get("status") == "completed")
   147â†’    return round(completed / len(rocks) * 100)
   148â†’
   149â†’
   150â†’# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
   151â†’# State Read Service
   152â†’# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
   153â†’
   154â†’@skill_service("lifecoach", "state_read", description="è¯»å–äººç”Ÿåœ°å›¾çŠ¶æ€", auth_required=True)
   155â†’async def read_state(args: Dict[str, Any], context: ServiceContext) -> Dict[str, Any]:
   156â†’    """
   157â†’    è¯»å–ç”¨æˆ·çš„äººç”Ÿåœ°å›¾çŠ¶æ€
   158â†’
   159â†’    Args:
   160â†’        sections: è¦è¯»å–çš„æ•°æ®éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œå¦‚ ["north_star", "identity", "current", "progress"]
   161â†’
   162â†’    Returns:
   163â†’        status: success/empty/error
   164â†’        data: LifecoachSkillData æ ¼å¼çš„æ•°æ®
   165â†’    """
   166â†’    sections = args.get("sections", ["system", "north_star", "identity", "current", "progress"])
   167â†’
   168â†’    if not context.user_id:
   169â†’        return {"status": "error", "message": "Authentication required", "data": {}}
   170â†’
   171â†’    try:
   172â†’        # è·å–å®Œæ•´æ•°æ®
   173â†’        raw_data = await get_lifecoach_data(context.user_id)
   174â†’
   175â†’        if not raw_data:
   176â†’            return {
   177â†’                "status": "empty",
   178â†’                "message": "å°šæœªå»ºç«‹äººç”Ÿåœ°å›¾",
   179â†’                "data": {}
   180â†’            }
   181â†’
   182â†’        # è½¬æ¢ä¸ºå‰ç«¯æœŸæœ›çš„æ ¼å¼
   183â†’        result_data: Dict[str, Any] = {}
   184â†’
   185â†’        # north_star
   186â†’        if "north_star" in sections and "north_star" in raw_data:
   187â†’            result_data["north_star"] = raw_data["north_star"]
   188â†’
   189â†’        # identity
   190â†’        if "identity" in sections and "identity" in raw_data:
   191â†’            result_data["identity"] = raw_data["identity"]
   192â†’
   193â†’        # weekly (ä» current.week è½¬æ¢)
   194â†’        if "current" in sections:
   195â†’            current = raw_data.get("current", {})
   196â†’            if "week" in current:
   197â†’                week_data = current["week"]
   198â†’                result_data["weekly"] = {
   199â†’                    "week_start": week_data.get("week_start"),
   200â†’                    "rocks": week_data.get("rocks", []),
   201â†’                    "theme": week_data.get("theme"),
   202â†’                }
   203â†’
   204â†’        # progress
   205â†’        if "progress" in sections and "progress" in raw_data:
   206â†’            result_data["progress"] = raw_data["progress"]
   207â†’
   208â†’        # system state
   209â†’        if "system" in sections:
   210â†’            result_data["_state"] = raw_data.get("system", {})
   211â†’
   212â†’        return {
   213â†’            "status": "success",
   214â†’            "data": result_data
   215â†’        }
   216â†’
   217â†’    except Exception as e:
   218â†’        logger.error(f"Read lifecoach state failed: {e}")
   219â†’        return {"status": "error", "message": str(e), "data": {}}
   220â†’
   221â†’
   222â†’# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
   223â†’# Checkin Service
   224â†’# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
   225â†’
   226â†’@skill_service("lifecoach", "checkin", description="æ¯æ—¥ç­¾åˆ°", auth_required=True)
   227â†’async def daily_checkin(args: Dict[str, Any], context: ServiceContext) -> Dict[str, Any]:
   228â†’    """
   229â†’    æ¯æ—¥ç­¾åˆ°
   230â†’
   231â†’    Args:
   232â†’        energy_level: èƒ½é‡ç­‰çº§ (1-10)
   233â†’        intention: ä»Šæ—¥æ„å›¾
   234â†’        mood: å¿ƒæƒ…
   235â†’
   236â†’    Returns:
   237â†’        success: æ˜¯å¦æˆåŠŸ
   238â†’        streak: å½“å‰è¿ç»­å¤©æ•°
   239â†’        daily_levers: ä»Šæ—¥æ æ†è¡ŒåŠ¨
   240â†’    """
   241â†’    if not context.user_id:
   242â†’        return {"error": "Authentication required", "status": "error"}
   243â†’
   244â†’    energy_level = args.get("energy_level")
   245â†’    intention = args.get("intention")
   246â†’    mood = args.get("mood")
   247â†’
   248â†’    try:
   249â†’        data = await get_lifecoach_data(context.user_id)
   250â†’        progress = data.get("progress", {
   251â†’            "current_streak": 0,
   252â†’            "longest_streak": 0,
   253â†’            "total_checkins": 0,
   254â†’            "last_checkin_date": None,
   255â†’            "checkin_history": []
   256â†’        })
   257â†’
   258â†’        today = date.today().isoformat()
   259â†’        now = datetime.now(timezone.utc).isoformat()
   260â†’
   261â†’        # æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦ä»Šå¤©å·²ç­¾åˆ°
   262â†’        if progress.get("last_checkin_date") == today:
   263â†’            return {
   264â†’                "success": True,
   265â†’                "streak": progress["current_streak"],
   266â†’                "message": "ä»Šå¤©å·²ç»ç­¾åˆ°è¿‡äº†",
   267â†’                "already_checked_in": True
   268â†’            }
   269â†’
   270â†’        # è®¡ç®—è¿ç»­ç­¾åˆ°
   271â†’        last_date = progress.get("last_checkin_date")
   272â†’        old_streak = progress.get("current_streak", 0)
   273â†’
   274â†’        if last_date:
   275â†’            days_since = (date.today() - date.fromisoformat(last_date)).days
   276â†’            new_streak = old_streak + 1 if days_since == 1 else 1
   277â†’        else:
   278â†’            new_streak = 1
   279â†’
   280â†’        # æ›´æ–°è¿›åº¦
   281â†’        progress["current_streak"] = new_streak
   282â†’        progress["longest_streak"] = max(new_streak, progress.get("longest_streak", 0))
   283â†’        progress["total_checkins"] = progress.get("total_checkins", 0) + 1
   284â†’        progress["last_checkin_date"] = today
   285â†’
   286â†’        # è®°å½•ç­¾åˆ°å†å²
   287â†’        history = progress.get("checkin_history", [])
   288â†’        history.append({
   289â†’            "date": today,
   290â†’            "time": now,
   291â†’            "energy_level": energy_level,
   292â†’            "mood": mood,
   293â†’            "intention": intention
   294â†’        })
   295â†’        progress["checkin_history"] = history[-30:]  # ä¿ç•™æœ€è¿‘30å¤©
   296â†’
   297â†’        # æ›´æ–° current.daily çš„ intention å’Œ energy_level
   298â†’        current = data.get("current", {})
   299â†’        daily = current.get("daily", {"date": today, "levers": []})
   300â†’        if daily.get("date") != today:
   301â†’            daily = {"date": today, "levers": daily.get("levers", [])}
   302â†’        daily["energy_level"] = energy_level
   303â†’        daily["intention"] = intention
   304â†’        current["daily"] = daily
   305â†’
   306â†’        data["progress"] = progress
   307â†’        data["current"] = current
   308â†’
   309â†’        await save_lifecoach_data(context.user_id, data)
   310â†’
   311â†’        # å‡†å¤‡è¿”å›çš„ daily_levers
   312â†’        daily_levers = {
   313â†’            "date": today,
   314â†’            "levers": daily.get("levers", []),
   315â†’            "energy_level": energy_level,
   316â†’            "intention": intention,
   317â†’            "stats": _calculate_lever_stats(daily.get("levers", []))
   318â†’        }
   319â†’
   320â†’        return {
   321â†’            "success": True,
   322â†’            "streak": new_streak,
   323â†’            "message": f"ç­¾åˆ°æˆåŠŸï¼è¿ç»­ {new_streak} å¤©",
   324â†’            "daily_levers": daily_levers
   325â†’        }
   326â†’
   327â†’    except Exception as e:
   328â†’        logger.error(f"Checkin failed: {e}")
   329â†’        return {"success": False, "error": str(e)}
   330â†’
   331â†’
   332â†’# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
   333â†’# Lever Complete Service
   334â†’# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
   335â†’
   336â†’@skill_service("lifecoach", "lever_complete", description="å®Œæˆæ¯æ—¥æ æ†", auth_required=True)
   337â†’async def complete_lever(args: Dict[str, Any], context: ServiceContext) -> Dict[str, Any]:
   338â†’    """
   339â†’    å®Œæˆæ¯æ—¥æ æ†è¡ŒåŠ¨
   340â†’
   341â†’    Args:
   342â†’        lever_id: æ æ† ID
   343â†’        notes: å®Œæˆå¤‡æ³¨
   344â†’
   345â†’    Returns:
   346â†’        success: æ˜¯å¦æˆåŠŸ
   347â†’        progress: æ›´æ–°åçš„è¿›åº¦
   348â†’    """
   349â†’    if not context.user_id:
   350â†’        return {"error": "Authentication required", "status": "error"}
   351â†’
   352â†’    lever_id = args.get("lever_id")
   353â†’    notes = args.get("notes")
   354â†’
   355â†’    if not lever_id:
   356â†’        return {"success": False, "error": "lever_id is required"}
   357â†’
   358â†’    try:
   359â†’        data = await get_lifecoach_data(context.user_id)
   360â†’        current = data.get("current", {})
   361â†’        daily = current.get("daily", {"date": date.today().isoformat(), "levers": []})
   362â†’
   363â†’        now = datetime.now(timezone.utc).isoformat()
   364â†’
   365â†’        # æ›´æ–°æ æ†çŠ¶æ€
   366â†’        levers = daily.get("levers", [])
   367â†’        lever_found = False
   368â†’        for lever in levers:
   369â†’            if lever.get("id") == lever_id:
   370â†’                lever["status"] = "completed"
   371â†’                lever["completed_at"] = now
   372â†’                if notes:
   373â†’                    lever["notes"] = notes
   374â†’                lever_found = True
   375â†’                break
   376â†’
   377â†’        if not lever_found:
   378â†’            return {"success": False, "error": f"Lever {lever_id} not found"}
   379â†’
   380â†’        daily["levers"] = levers
   381â†’        current["daily"] = daily
   382â†’
   383â†’        # è®°å½•åˆ° progress.completed_levers
   384â†’        progress = data.get("progress", {})
   385â†’        completed_levers = progress.get("completed_levers", [])
   386â†’        completed_levers.append({
   387â†’            "id": lever_id,
   388â†’            "completed_at": now,
   389â†’            "notes": notes
   390â†’        })
   391â†’        progress["completed_levers"] = completed_levers[-100:]  # ä¿ç•™æœ€è¿‘100æ¡
   392â†’
   393â†’        data["current"] = current
   394â†’        data["progress"] = progress
   395â†’
   396â†’        await save_lifecoach_data(context.user_id, data)
   397â†’
   398â†’        # è½¬æ¢è¿”å›æ ¼å¼
   399â†’        transformed = transform_to_frontend_format(data)
   400â†’
   401â†’        return {
   402â†’            "success": True,
   403â†’            "message": "æ æ†å·²å®Œæˆ",
   404â†’            "progress": transformed.get("progress")
   405â†’        }
   406â†’
   407â†’    except Exception as e:
   408â†’        logger.error(f"Complete lever failed: {e}")
   409â†’        return {"success": False, "error": str(e)}
   410â†’

   413â†’# Rock Complete Service
   414â†’# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

   644â†’async def get_weekly_review(args: Dict[str, Any], context: ServiceContext) -> Dict[str, Any]:

   691â†’# State Write Service
   692â†’# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
   693â†’
   694â†’def deep_merge(base: Dict[str, Any], update: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
   695â†’    """æ·±åº¦åˆå¹¶ä¸¤ä¸ªå­—å…¸"""
   696â†’    result = base.copy()
   697â†’    for key, value in update.items():
   698â†’        if key in result and isinstance(result[key], dict) and isinstance(value, dict):
   699â†’            result[key] = deep_merge(result[key], value)
   700â†’        elif value is not None:
   701â†’            result[key] = value
   702â†’    return result

   704â†’
   705â†’VALID_SECTIONS = ["system", "north_star", "goals", "roadmap", "current", "identity", "progress", "journal"]

   717â†’    Returns:

   726â†’
   727â†’    if section not in VALID_SECTIONS:
   728â†’        return {"status": "error", "message": f"æ— æ•ˆçš„ section: {section}"}
   729â†’
   730â†’    if not context.user_id:

   732â†’
   733â†’    try:

   736â†’

   743â†’        existing_data["_last_updated"] = datetime.now(timezone.utc).isoformat()

   746â†’        # ä¿å­˜

   749â†’        return {"status": "success", "message": f"å·²ä¿å­˜ {section}"}

"""
Lifecoach Skill API Services - äººç”Ÿä»ªè¡¨ç›˜ API æœåŠ¡

ä½¿ç”¨ @skill_service è£…é¥°å™¨è‡ªåŠ¨æ³¨å†Œåˆ° SkillServiceRegistry
é€šè¿‡ /api/v1/skills/lifecoach/{action} è®¿é—®

ç«¯ç‚¹:
- state_read: è¯»å–äººç”Ÿåœ°å›¾çŠ¶æ€
- checkin: æ¯æ—¥ç­¾åˆ°
- lever_complete: å®Œæˆæ¯æ—¥æ æ†
- rock_complete: å®Œæˆå‘¨å¤§çŸ³å¤´
- lever_skip: è·³è¿‡æ¯æ—¥æ æ†
- journal_add: æ·»åŠ æ—¥å¿—
- journal_list: è·å–æ—¥å¿—åˆ—è¡¨
- weekly_review: è·å–å‘¨å¤ç›˜æ•°æ®
"""
import logging
from typing import Dict, Any, List, Optional
from datetime import datetime, date, timezone
from uuid import UUID

from services.agent.skill_service_registry import skill_service, ServiceContext
from stores.unified_profile_repo import UnifiedProfileRepository

logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)


# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# Helper Functions
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

async def get_lifecoach_data(user_id: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:
    """ä» unified_profile è·å– lifecoach æ•°æ®"""
    user_uuid = UUID(user_id) if isinstance(user_id, str) else user_id
    data = await UnifiedProfileRepository.read_life_context_path(user_uuid, "lifecoach")
    return data.content if data else {}


async def save_lifecoach_data(user_id: str, data: Dict[str, Any]) -> None:
    """ä¿å­˜ lifecoach æ•°æ®åˆ° unified_profile"""
    user_uuid = UUID(user_id) if isinstance(user_id, str) else user_id
    data["_last_updated"] = datetime.now(timezone.utc).isoformat()
    await UnifiedProfileRepository.write_life_context_path(user_uuid, "lifecoach", data)


def transform_to_frontend_format(data: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
    """å°†å­˜å‚¨æ ¼å¼è½¬æ¢ä¸ºå‰ç«¯æœŸæœ›çš„æ ¼å¼"""
    result = {}

    # north_star
    if "north_star" in data:
        result["north_star"] = data["north_star"]

    # goals
    if "goals" in data:
        goals_data = data["goals"]
        if isinstance(goals_data, dict):
            result["goals"] = goals_data.get("items", [])
        elif isinstance(goals_data, list):
            result["goals"] = goals_data

    # roles
    if "roles" in data or "identity" in data:
        identity = data.get("identity", {})
        result["roles"] = identity.get("roles", [])

    # identity
    if "identity" in data:
        result["identity"] = data["identity"]

    # weekly_rocks -> current.week
    current = data.get("current", {})
    if "week" in current:
        week_data = current["week"]
        result["weekly_rocks"] = {
            "week_start": week_data.get("week_start", date.today().isoformat()),
            "rocks": week_data.get("rocks", []),
            "theme": week_data.get("theme"),
            "energy_budget": week_data.get("energy_budget"),
            "stats": _calculate_rock_stats(week_data.get("rocks", []))
        }

    # daily_levers -> current.daily
    if "daily" in current:
        daily_data = current["daily"]
        result["daily_levers"] = {
            "date": daily_data.get("date", date.today().isoformat()),
            "levers": daily_data.get("levers", []),
            "energy_level": daily_data.get("energy_level"),
            "intention": daily_data.get("intention"),
            "stats": _calculate_lever_stats(daily_data.get("levers", []))
        }

    # monthly_boss -> current.month
    if "month" in current:
        result["monthly_boss"] = current["month"]

    # progress
    if "progress" in data:
        progress = data["progress"]
        today = date.today().isoformat()
        result["progress"] = {
            "current_streak": progress.get("current_streak", 0),
            "longest_streak": progress.get("longest_streak", 0),
            "total_checkins": progress.get("total_checkins", 0),
            "weekly_completion_rate": _calculate_weekly_completion_rate(current),
            "monthly_stats": progress.get("monthly_stats"),
            "achievements": progress.get("achievements", []),
            "last_checkin_date": progress.get("last_checkin_date"),
            "today_checked_in": progress.get("last_checkin_date") == today,
        }

    return result


def _calculate_rock_stats(rocks: List[Dict]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
    """è®¡ç®—å‘¨å¤§çŸ³å¤´ç»Ÿè®¡"""
    total = len(rocks)
    completed = sum(1 for r in rocks if r.get("status") == "completed")
    in_progress = sum(1 for r in rocks if r.get("status") == "in_progress")
    return {
        "total": total,
        "completed": completed,
        "in_progress": in_progress,
        "completion_rate": round(completed / total * 100) if total > 0 else 0
    }


def _calculate_lever_stats(levers: List[Dict]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
    """è®¡ç®—æ¯æ—¥æ æ†ç»Ÿè®¡"""
    total = len(levers)
    completed = sum(1 for l in levers if l.get("status") == "completed")
    return {
        "total": total,
        "completed": completed,
        "completion_rate": round(completed / total * 100) if total > 0 else 0
    }


def _calculate_weekly_completion_rate(current: Dict[str, Any]) -> int:
    """è®¡ç®—æœ¬å‘¨å®Œæˆç‡"""
    week_data = current.get("week", {})
    rocks = week_data.get("rocks", [])
    if not rocks:
        return 0
    completed = sum(1 for r in rocks if r.get("status") == "completed")
    return round(completed / len(rocks) * 100)

# State Read Service
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

@skill_service("lifecoach", "state_read", description="è¯»å–äººç”Ÿåœ°å›¾çŠ¶æ€", auth_required=True)
async def read_state(args: Dict[str, Any], context: ServiceContext) -> Dict[str, Any]:
    """
    è¯»å–ç”¨æˆ·çš„äººç”Ÿåœ°å›¾çŠ¶æ€

    Args:
        sections: è¦è¯»å–çš„æ•°æ®éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œå¦‚ ["north_star", "identity", "current", "progress"]

    Returns:
        status: success/empty/error
        data: LifecoachSkillData æ ¼å¼çš„æ•°æ®
    """
    sections = args.get("sections", ["system", "north_star", "identity", "current", "progress"])

    if not context.user_id:
        return {"status": "error", "message": "Authentication required", "data": {}}

    try:
        # è·å–å®Œæ•´æ•°æ®
        raw_data = await get_lifecoach_data(context.user_id)

        if not raw_data:
            return {
                "status": "empty",
                "message": "å°šæœªå»ºç«‹äººç”Ÿåœ°å›¾",
                "data": {}
            }

        # è½¬æ¢ä¸ºå‰ç«¯æœŸæœ›çš„æ ¼å¼
        result_data: Dict[str, Any] = {}

        # north_star
        if "north_star" in sections and "north_star" in raw_data:
            result_data["north_star"] = raw_data["north_star"]

        # identity
        if "identity" in sections and "identity" in raw_data:
            result_data["identity"] = raw_data["identity"]

        # weekly (ä» current.week è½¬æ¢)
        if "current" in sections:
            current = raw_data.get("current", {})
            if "week" in current:
                week_data = current["week"]
                result_data["weekly"] = {
                    "week_start": week_data.get("week_start"),
                    "rocks": week_data.get("rocks", []),
                    "theme": week_data.get("theme"),
                }

        # progress
        if "progress" in sections and "progress" in raw_data:
            result_data["progress"] = raw_data["progress"]

        # system state
        if "system" in sections:
            result_data["_state"] = raw_data.get("system", {})

        return {
            "status": "success",
            "data": result_data
        }

    except Exception as e:
        logger.error(f"Read lifecoach state failed: {e}")
        return {"status": "error", "message": str(e), "data": {}}

# Checkin Service
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

@skill_service("lifecoach", "checkin", description="æ¯æ—¥ç­¾åˆ°", auth_required=True)
async def daily_checkin(args: Dict[str, Any], context: ServiceContext) -> Dict[str, Any]:
    """
    æ¯æ—¥ç­¾åˆ°

    Args:
        energy_level: èƒ½é‡ç­‰çº§ (1-10)
        intention: ä»Šæ—¥æ„å›¾
        mood: å¿ƒæƒ…

    Returns:
        success: æ˜¯å¦æˆåŠŸ
        streak: å½“å‰è¿ç»­å¤©æ•°
        daily_levers: ä»Šæ—¥æ æ†è¡ŒåŠ¨
    """
    if not context.user_id:
        return {"error": "Authentication required", "status": "error"}

    energy_level = args.get("energy_level")
    intention = args.get("intention")
    mood = args.get("mood")

    try:
        data = await get_lifecoach_data(context.user_id)
        progress = data.get("progress", {
            "current_streak": 0,
            "longest_streak": 0,
            "total_checkins": 0,
            "last_checkin_date": None,
            "checkin_history": []
        })

        today = date.today().isoformat()
        now = datetime.now(timezone.utc).isoformat()

        # æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦ä»Šå¤©å·²ç­¾åˆ°
        if progress.get("last_checkin_date") == today:
            return {
                "success": True,
                "streak": progress["current_streak"],
                "message": "ä»Šå¤©å·²ç»ç­¾åˆ°è¿‡äº†",
                "already_checked_in": True
            }

        # è®¡ç®—è¿ç»­ç­¾åˆ°
        last_date = progress.get("last_checkin_date")
        old_streak = progress.get("current_streak", 0)

        if last_date:
            days_since = (date.today() - date.fromisoformat(last_date)).days
            new_streak = old_streak + 1 if days_since == 1 else 1
        else:
            new_streak = 1

        # æ›´æ–°è¿›åº¦
        progress["current_streak"] = new_streak
        progress["longest_streak"] = max(new_streak, progress.get("longest_streak", 0))
        progress["total_checkins"] = progress.get("total_checkins", 0) + 1
        progress["last_checkin_date"] = today

        # è®°å½•ç­¾åˆ°å†å²
        history = progress.get("checkin_history", [])
        history.append({
            "date": today,
            "time": now,
            "energy_level": energy_level,
            "mood": mood,
            "intention": intention
        })
        progress["checkin_history"] = history[-30:]  # ä¿ç•™æœ€è¿‘30å¤©

        # æ›´æ–° current.daily çš„ intention å’Œ energy_level
        current = data.get("current", {})
        daily = current.get("daily", {"date": today, "levers": []})
        if daily.get("date") != today:
            daily = {"date": today, "levers": daily.get("levers", [])}
        daily["energy_level"] = energy_level
        daily["intention"] = intention
        current["daily"] = daily

        data["progress"] = progress
        data["current"] = current

        await save_lifecoach_data(context.user_id, data)

        # å‡†å¤‡è¿”å›çš„ daily_levers
        daily_levers = {
            "date": today,
            "levers": daily.get("levers", []),
            "energy_level": energy_level,
            "intention": intention,
            "stats": _calculate_lever_stats(daily.get("levers", []))
        }

        return {
            "success": True,
            "streak": new_streak,
            "message": f"ç­¾åˆ°æˆåŠŸï¼è¿ç»­ {new_streak} å¤©",
            "daily_levers": daily_levers
        }

    except Exception as e:
        logger.error(f"Checkin failed: {e}")
        return {"success": False, "error": str(e)}

# Lever Complete Service
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

@skill_service("lifecoach", "lever_complete", description="å®Œæˆæ¯æ—¥æ æ†", auth_required=True)
async def complete_lever(args: Dict[str, Any], context: ServiceContext) -> Dict[str, Any]:
    """
    å®Œæˆæ¯æ—¥æ æ†è¡ŒåŠ¨

    Args:
        lever_id: æ æ† ID
        notes: å®Œæˆå¤‡æ³¨

    Returns:
        success: æ˜¯å¦æˆåŠŸ
        progress: æ›´æ–°åçš„è¿›åº¦
    """
    if not context.user_id:
        return {"error": "Authentication required", "status": "error"}

    lever_id = args.get("lever_id")
    notes = args.get("notes")

    if not lever_id:
        return {"success": False, "error": "lever_id is required"}

    try:
        data = await get_lifecoach_data(context.user_id)
        current = data.get("current", {})
        daily = current.get("daily", {"date": date.today().isoformat(), "levers": []})

        now = datetime.now(timezone.utc).isoformat()

        # æ›´æ–°æ æ†çŠ¶æ€
        levers = daily.get("levers", [])
        lever_found = False
        for lever in levers:
            if lever.get("id") == lever_id:
                lever["status"] = "completed"
                lever["completed_at"] = now
                if notes:
                    lever["notes"] = notes
                lever_found = True
                break

        if not lever_found:
            return {"success": False, "error": f"Lever {lever_id} not found"}

        daily["levers"] = levers
        current["daily"] = daily

        # è®°å½•åˆ° progress.completed_levers
        progress = data.get("progress", {})
        completed_levers = progress.get("completed_levers", [])
        completed_levers.append({
            "id": lever_id,
            "completed_at": now,
            "notes": notes
        })
        progress["completed_levers"] = completed_levers[-100:]  # ä¿ç•™æœ€è¿‘100æ¡

        data["current"] = current
        data["progress"] = progress

        await save_lifecoach_data(context.user_id, data)

        # è½¬æ¢è¿”å›æ ¼å¼
        transformed = transform_to_frontend_format(data)

        return {
            "success": True,
            "message": "æ æ†å·²å®Œæˆ",
            "progress": transformed.get("progress")
        }

    except Exception as e:
        logger.error(f"Complete lever failed: {e}")
        return {"success": False, "error": str(e)}

# Rock Complete Service
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

@skill_service("lifecoach", "rock_complete", description="å®Œæˆå‘¨å¤§çŸ³å¤´", auth_required=True)
async def complete_rock(args: Dict[str, Any], context: ServiceContext) -> Dict[str, Any]:
    """
    å®Œæˆå‘¨å¤§çŸ³å¤´

    Args:
        rock_id: å¤§çŸ³å¤´ ID
        reflection: å®Œæˆåæ€

    Returns:
        success: æ˜¯å¦æˆåŠŸ
        progress: æ›´æ–°åçš„è¿›åº¦
    """
    if not context.user_id:
        return {"error": "Authentication required", "status": "error"}

    rock_id = args.get("rock_id")
    reflection = args.get("reflection")

    if not rock_id:
        return {"success": False, "error": "rock_id is required"}

    try:
        data = await get_lifecoach_data(context.user_id)
        current = data.get("current", {})
        week = current.get("week", {"rocks": []})

        now = datetime.now(timezone.utc).isoformat()

        # æ›´æ–°å¤§çŸ³å¤´çŠ¶æ€
        rocks = week.get("rocks", [])
        rock_found = False
        for rock in rocks:
            if rock.get("id") == rock_id:
                rock["status"] = "completed"
                rock["progress"] = 100
                rock["completed_at"] = now
                if reflection:
                    rock["reflection"] = reflection
                rock_found = True
                break

        if not rock_found:
            return {"success": False, "error": f"Rock {rock_id} not found"}

        week["rocks"] = rocks
        current["week"] = week

        # è®°å½•åˆ° progress.completed_rocks
        progress = data.get("progress", {})
        completed_rocks = progress.get("completed_rocks", [])
        completed_rocks.append({
            "id": rock_id,
            "completed_at": now,
            "reflection": reflection
        })
        progress["completed_rocks"] = completed_rocks[-50:]

        data["current"] = current
        data["progress"] = progress

        await save_lifecoach_data(context.user_id, data)

        transformed = transform_to_frontend_format(data)

        return {
            "success": True,
            "message": "å¤§çŸ³å¤´å·²å®Œæˆï¼",
            "progress": transformed.get("progress")
        }

    except Exception as e:
        logger.error(f"Complete rock failed: {e}")
        return {"success": False, "error": str(e)}

# Journal Services
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

@skill_service("lifecoach", "journal_add", description="æ·»åŠ æ—¥å¿—æ¡ç›®", auth_required=True)
async def add_journal_entry(args: Dict[str, Any], context: ServiceContext) -> Dict[str, Any]:
    """
    æ·»åŠ å¤ç›˜æ—¥å¿—

    Args:
        type: æ—¥å¿—ç±»å‹ (reflection, gratitude, insight, note)
        content: å†…å®¹
        mood: å¿ƒæƒ…
        tags: æ ‡ç­¾åˆ—è¡¨
    """
    if not context.user_id:
        return {"error": "Authentication required", "status": "error"}

    entry_type = args.get("type", "note")
    content = args.get("content")

    if not content:
        return {"success": False, "error": "content is required"}

    try:
        data = await get_lifecoach_data(context.user_id)
        journal = data.get("journal", [])

        import uuid
        entry = {
            "id": str(uuid.uuid4()),
            "date": date.today().isoformat(),
            "type": entry_type,
            "content": content,
            "mood": args.get("mood"),
            "tags": args.get("tags", []),
            "created_at": datetime.now(timezone.utc).isoformat()
        }

        journal = [entry] + journal[:99]  # ä¿ç•™æœ€è¿‘100æ¡
        data["journal"] = journal

        await save_lifecoach_data(context.user_id, data)

        return {
            "success": True,
            "entry": entry
        }

    except Exception as e:
        logger.error(f"Add journal entry failed: {e}")
        return {"success": False, "error": str(e)}


@skill_service("lifecoach", "journal_list", description="è·å–æ—¥å¿—åˆ—è¡¨", auth_required=True)
async def list_journal_entries(args: Dict[str, Any], context: ServiceContext) -> Dict[str, Any]:
    """
    è·å–æ—¥å¿—åˆ—è¡¨

    Args:
        limit: è¿”å›æ•°é‡ï¼Œé»˜è®¤ 10
        offset: åç§»é‡ï¼Œé»˜è®¤ 0
    """
    if not context.user_id:
        return {"error": "Authentication required", "status": "error"}

    limit = args.get("limit", 10)
    offset = args.get("offset", 0)

    try:
        data = await get_lifecoach_data(context.user_id)
        journal = data.get("journal", [])

        entries = journal[offset:offset + limit]

        return {
            "entries": entries,
            "total": len(journal),
            "limit": limit,
            "offset": offset
        }

    except Exception as e:
        logger.error(f"List journal entries failed: {e}")
        return {"entries": [], "error": str(e)}


# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# Weekly Review Service
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

@skill_service("lifecoach", "weekly_review", description="è·å–å‘¨å¤ç›˜æ•°æ®", auth_required=True)
async def get_weekly_review(args: Dict[str, Any], context: ServiceContext) -> Dict[str, Any]:
    """
    è·å–å‘¨å¤ç›˜æ•°æ®

    Args:
        week_start: å‘¨èµ·å§‹æ—¥æœŸï¼Œé»˜è®¤æœ¬å‘¨
    """
    if not context.user_id:
        return {"error": "Authentication required", "status": "error"}

    try:
        data = await get_lifecoach_data(context.user_id)
        current = data.get("current", {})
        week = current.get("week", {})
        daily = current.get("daily", {})

        rocks = week.get("rocks", [])
        levers = daily.get("levers", [])

        review = {
            "week_start": week.get("week_start", date.today().isoformat()),
            "rocks_completed": sum(1 for r in rocks if r.get("status") == "completed"),
            "rocks_total": len(rocks),
            "levers_completed": sum(1 for l in levers if l.get("status") == "completed"),
            "levers_total": len(levers),
            "theme": week.get("theme"),
        }

        # ä» journal è·å–æœ¬å‘¨çš„æ´å¯Ÿ
        journal = data.get("journal", [])
        week_start = week.get("week_start", date.today().isoformat())
        week_insights = [
            j for j in journal
            if j.get("date", "") >= week_start and j.get("type") in ["insight", "reflection"]
        ]

        if week_insights:
            review["highlights"] = [j.get("content") for j in week_insights[:3]]

        return review

    except Exception as e:
        logger.error(f"Get weekly review failed: {e}")
        return {"error": str(e)}


# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# State Write Service
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

def deep_merge(base: Dict[str, Any], update: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:
    """æ·±åº¦åˆå¹¶ä¸¤ä¸ªå­—å…¸"""
    result = base.copy()
    for key, value in update.items():
        if key in result and isinstance(result[key], dict) and isinstance(value, dict):
            result[key] = deep_merge(result[key], value)
        elif value is not None:
            result[key] = value
    return result


VALID_SECTIONS = ["system", "north_star", "goals", "roadmap", "current", "identity", "progress", "journal"]


@skill_service("lifecoach", "state_write", description="å†™å…¥äººç”Ÿåœ°å›¾çŠ¶æ€", auth_required=True)
async def write_state(args: Dict[str, Any], context: ServiceContext) -> Dict[str, Any]:
    """
    å†™å…¥ç”¨æˆ·çš„äººç”Ÿåœ°å›¾çŠ¶æ€

    Args:
        section: è¦å†™å…¥çš„éƒ¨åˆ† (system, north_star, goals, roadmap, current, identity, progress, journal)
        data: è¦å†™å…¥çš„æ•°æ®

    Returns:
        status: success/error
        message: ç»“æœæ¶ˆæ¯
    """
    section = args.get("section")
    write_data = args.get("data")

    if not section or not write_data:
        return {"status": "error", "message": "ç¼ºå°‘å¿…è¦å‚æ•°: section å’Œ data"}

    if section not in VALID_SECTIONS:
        return {"status": "error", "message": f"æ— æ•ˆçš„ section: {section}"}

    if not context.user_id:
        return {"status": "error", "message": "Authentication required"}

    try:
        # è·å–ç°æœ‰æ•°æ®
        existing_data = await get_lifecoach_data(context.user_id)

        # æ·±åº¦åˆå¹¶
        if section in existing_data and isinstance(existing_data[section], dict) and isinstance(write_data, dict):
            existing_data[section] = deep_merge(existing_data[section], write_data)
        else:
            existing_data[section] = write_data

        existing_data["_last_updated"] = datetime.now(timezone.utc).isoformat()
        existing_data["_last_section"] = section

        # ä¿å­˜
        await save_lifecoach_data(context.user_id, existing_data)

        return {"status": "success", "message": f"å·²ä¿å­˜ {section}"}

    except Exception as e:
        logger.error(f"Write lifecoach state failed: {e}")
        return {"status": "error", "message": str(e)}
